metadata.title: CVE-2024-0914 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A timing side-channel vulnerability has been discovered in the opencryptokipackage while processing RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 padded ciphertexts. This flawcould potentially enable unauthorized RSA ciphertext decryption or signing,even without access to the corresponding private key.

criterions.comment: opencryptoki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
